artist: Painter: After Lucio Massari; Designer: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Gaetano Guadagnini
description: in foreground man in rags kneeling before richly dressed man; servant holding clothes at right; outside arch, man on horse and two figures; above angels playing musical instruments seated on a cloud; arched composition
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Luacio Massari dip.  F. Rosaspina dis.  G. Guadognini inc./ IL FIGLIUOL PRODIGO | in pencil on sheet: 2-30
title: The Prodigal Son
